channel.title: Guides on The Hansaricks

item.title: Time Travelers English Translation for Android
item.description:
The game Time Travelers is a sort of visual novel choice driven game. Honestly I haven’t played more than 10 minutes just to get it running, but after the effort I have down the proper steps that work with Azahar, Azahar Plus, and Citra for Android. As of this writing thats:

  • Azahar Plus build 204fde666
  • Azahar 2123.3
  • Citra 988f294

I’ve tested this out with my Ayn Thor 2025 model (in case there’s another model in the future), running Android 13.
